mpegTsStreaming.name: 1280x720(main)
mpegTsStreaming.cmd: %FFMPEG% -re -dual_mono_mode main -i pipe:0 -c:a aac -ar 48000 -ab 192k -ac 2 -c:v hevc_nvenc -s 1280x720 -filter:v yadif -aspect 16:9 -vb 3000k -f mpegts pipe:1

mpegTsStreaming.name: 720x480(main)
mpegTsStreaming.cmd: %FFMPEG% -re -dual_mono_mode main -i pipe:0 -c:a aac -ar 48000 -ab 128k -ac 2 -c:v hevc_nvenc -s 720x480 -filter:v yadif -aspect 16:9 -vb 1500k -f mpegts pipe:1

recordedHLS.name: 720x480(main)
recordedHLS.cmd: %FFMPEG% -re -dual_mono_mode main -i %INPUT% -f hls -hls_time 3 -hls_list_size 0 -hls_allow_cache 1 -hls_segment_filename %streamFileDir%/stream%streamNum%-%09d.ts -threads auto -c:a aac -ar 48000 -ab 128k -ac 2 -c:v hevc_nvenc -s 720x480 -filter:v yadif -aspect 16:9 -vb 1500k -flags +loop-global_header %OUTPUT%

recordedHLS.name: 720x480(hevc)
recordedHLS.cmd: %FFMPEG% -hwaccel cuvid -c:v hevc_cuvid -i %INPUT% -f hls -hls_time 3 -hls_list_size 0 -hls_allow_cache 1 -hls_segment_filename %streamFileDir%/stream%streamNum%-%09d.ts -threads auto -c:a aac -ar 48000 -ab 128k -ac 2 -c:v hevc_nvenc -vf scale_npp=720:480 -aspect 16:9 -vb 1500k -flags +loop-global_header %OUTPUT%
